name: barracks-react
description: An action dispatcher for unidirectional data flows for React components

scripts.test: standard && browserify -d -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/test.js | tape-run
scripts.coverage: standard && browserify -d -p tape-istanbul/plugin -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/test.js | tape-run | tape-istanbul
scripts.cov: npm run coverage && istanbul report && opener coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: Todd Kennedy <todd@selfassembled.org>
